Uses of Point in mcm.graphics
 

Methods in mcm.graphics that return Point
 Point Drawable.getCenter()
          Returns the center point of this drawable.
 Point Shape.getHotSpotPoint()
          Returns the shape's hotSpot point.
 Point Body.getPos()
          Returns the body's current position.
 Point Shape.getPos(int alignment, Point global)
          Returns the coordinates of the point at the given alignment position relative to this shape's hotSpot.
 Point Body.gotoPos(double dist)
          Retunrs the point dist away from the body's current position.
 Point Body.transFromLocal(double x, double y)
          The same as transFromLocal(x,y,null).
 Point Body.transFromLocal(double x, double y, Point global)
          Returns the global coordinates for the point (x,y).
 Point Body.transToGlobal(int alignment)
          The same as transToGlobal(alignment, null)
 Point Body.transToGlobal(int alignment, Point global)
          Returns the global coordinates of the point at the given alignment position in this body's shape.
 Point Body.transToLocal(double x, double y)
          The same as transToLocal(x,y,null).
 Point Body.transToLocal(double x, double y, Point local)
          Returns the local coordinates for the point (x,y).
 

Methods in mcm.graphics with parameters of type Point
 boolean Body.contains(Point pos)
          The same as contains(pos.x, pos.y)
 void Shape.draw(Point p, java.awt.Graphics2D gr)
          Paints the given shape such that its hot spot appears at the given point.
 Point Shape.getPos(int alignment, Point global)
          Returns the coordinates of the point at the given alignment position relative to this shape's hotSpot.
 boolean Drawable.isInside(Point pt)
          The same as isInsize(pt.x, pt.y)
 void Body.jumpTo(Point to)
          Sets the body's position to the given point.
 void Shape.setHotSpotPoint(Point hotSpotPoint)
          Sets the shape's hotSpot point to the given point and its hotSpot mode to FIXED_POINT.
 void Body.setHotSpotPoint(Point hotSpotPoint)
          Sets the hot spot of this body's shape to the given point; as well as the shape's hotSpot mode to Shape.FIXED_POINT.
 Point Body.transFromLocal(double x, double y, Point global)
          Returns the global coordinates for the point (x,y).
 Point Body.transToGlobal(int alignment, Point global)
          Returns the global coordinates of the point at the given alignment position in this body's shape.
 Point Body.transToLocal(double x, double y, Point local)
          Returns the local coordinates for the point (x,y).
 

Constructors in mcm.graphics with parameters of type Point
Point(Point p)
          Constructs and initializes a point with coordinates (p.x, p.y)
 

Uses of Point in mcm.theater
 

Methods in mcm.theater that return Point
 Point Stage.getCenter()
          Returns the center point of this stage.
 

Methods in mcm.theater with parameters of type Point
 boolean Stage.isInside(Point pt)
          Determines whether the given point lies within this stage's boundaries.
 void Actor.lineTo(Point to)
          Sets the body's position to the given point and always leaves a trail along the jumped distance.
 void Actor.moveTo(Point to)
          This method has the same effect as moveTo(to.x, to.y).
 

Uses of Point in mcm.utils
 

Methods in mcm.utils that return Point
static Point Dice.throwPoint(Drawable s)
          Chooses a random Point on the given Drawable.
